1 Managers

The Base Framework of Egeo includes a series of managers to encapsulate the access to the original data structures. It works like an API inside the Sass code. This keeps the system flexible and decoupled allowing that if we want to modify the data structures in the future to a better performance or more correct approach we can do it only changing the structure and the API. This is particularly useful when we want to adapt our code to a new version of Sass or if we plan to add a new 3rd party library.

1.1 Color Manager

The color manager is the set of settings and functions to work with colors in Egeo. It provides a Sass map with the whole colors defined by the Design Team in the visual specification.

The Sass map of colors is defined as !default so it is perfectly possible redefine it via theming to adapt it to all possibilities.

See also:

  • settings.colors
  • tools.colors

1.2 Typography Manager

The typography manager is the set of settings and functions to work with fonts in Egeo. It provides several Sass maps with the whole font families, weights and sizes defined by the Design Team in the visual specification as well as the line heights.

All these Sass maps are defined as !default so it is perfectly possible redefine them via theming to adapt it to all possibilities.

See also:

  • settings.typography
  • tools.typography

1.3 Layer Manager

The layer manager is the set of settings and functions to work with layers in Egeo. It provides a Sass maps with the whole possible z-index values could be used in the app.

This Sass maps is defined as !default so it is perfectly possible redefine it via theming to adapt it to all possibilities.

See also:

  • settings.typography
  • tools.typography
Created using kss-node and kss-node-template.
